channel.title: Javier Bardem on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Javier Bardem on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Emmy Winner Hannah Einbinder Explains Her “Free Palestine” On-Stage Comment
item.description: “I feel like it’s my obligation as a Jewish person to distinguish Jews from the state of Israel,” she said, in part, while backstage after her win for her role in ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Emmy Winner Hannah Einbinder Explains Her “Free Palestine” On-Stage Comment
item.description: “I feel like it’s my obligation as a Jewish person to distinguish Jews from the state of Israel,” she said, in part, while backstage after her win for her role in ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Paramount Condemns Israeli Film Boycott Amid Palestine Conflict: “We Do Not Agree”
item.description: “We need more engagement and communication — not less,” the studio said in a statement released Friday in the wake of a pledge signed by stars like Emma Stone, Mark Ruffalo and Ayo Edebiri.
